about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a highly motivated and results-driven software developer with a strong foundation in full-stack web development and mobile app development. I thrive on building impactful applications and solving complex challenges with elegant and efficient code. My expertise includes designing scalable architectures, developing robust APIs, and creating intuitive user interfaces.

list.title: Freelance Web Developer
details: Conducted comprehensive code reviews and successfully deployed client websites on Vercel, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Implemented advanced SEO strategies, significantly improving website visibility and search rankings on Google.
Designed and developed robust backend APIs, seamlessly integrating MongoDB and SQL databases for scalable data management.
Engineered full-stack web applications using React and Express, delivering responsive and user-friendly solutions tailored to client needs.
